### Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Services - Charlottetown Research and Development Centre

#### **Solicitation Number:** 01B46-23-085
#### **Amendment Number:** 2
#### **Publication Date:** 2023-07-21
#### **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-15T14:00:00
#### **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-09-19
#### **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-09-18

The Charlottetown Research and Development Centre (CRDC) invites qualified refrigeration and air conditioning contracting firms to submit a Standing Offer (SO) for refrigeration and air conditioning services. The contract period is expected to be from September 19, 2023, to September 18, 2024, with the possibility of extending the Standing Offer for four (4) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions.

#### **Tender Description:**
The contract requirements include overhauling refrigeration and air conditioning equipment in any of the buildings at the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre (CRDC) and the Harrington Farm on an "As and when Requested" basis. The total estimated budget for the Standing Offer is $50,000.00 per year for a total of $250,000.00 (Goods and Services tax or Harmonized Sales tax not included).

#### **Optional Site Visit:**
An optional site visit is scheduled for August 16, 2023, at 9:00 am (Local Time).

#### **Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or submissions, please contact:

* Claudia Lauzier
* claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca
* (438) 455-2392

#### **Tender Documents:**
The tender documents and addenda can be downloaded from the following links:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7442/addendum-01---extended-solicitation-period.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7442/01b46-23-085-rfso-final.pdf

#### **Trade Agreements:**
The Standing Offer is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
